channel.title: Devops on Sherry's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Devops on Sherry's blog

item.description: Git tips in DevOps workflow This is the second phase of my current project. After the Beta version of the project, I upgraded and shift the whole project into DevOps workflow. Git, is most essential part of the version control. So in this post, I will share some tips that I have encountered Git Branching Models There should be at least two models: Dev and Master. Dev branch is the front line defensing bugs.
